summary.overallFindings: AT&T Inc. demonstrates a comprehensive and mature approach to responsible AI across all key pillars, with strong evidence of transparency, fairness, explainability, human oversight, privacy, governance, and public accountability. The company provides detailed policies, frameworks, and implementation examples that highlight its commitment to ethical and trustworthy AI. There are no significant gaps identified, and AT&T's public documentation and external validations reinforce its leadership in responsible AI practices.
